My_Organisations_User_Profile_Page.disabled_section_header: Disable user from this sponsor organisation
My_Organisations_User_Profile_Page.disabled_section_guidance_text: Disabling this user will stop them from working under this sponsor organisation and can be reversed.
My_Organisations_User_Profile_Page.enabled_section_header: Enable user for this sponsor organisation
My_Organisations_User_Profile_Page.enabled_section_guidance_text: Enabling this user will allow them to work under this sponsor organisation and can be reversed.
